content.text:
# 2025 President's Cup

Nicolai Budkov Kjær
| champmd =  Taisei Ichikawa /  Kokoro Isomura
| champws =  Ekaterina Maklakova
| champwd =  Asylzhan Arystanbekova /  Ingkar Dyussebay
}}
The '''2025 President's Cup''' was a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts. It was the 20th edition of the men's tournament which was part of the 2025 ATP Challenger Tour, and the 16th edition of the women's tournament which was part of the 2025 ITF Women's World Tennis Tour. It took place in Astana, Kazakhstan between 28 July and 10 August 2025.
Champions
Men's singles
*  Nicolai Budkov Kjær def.  Alexandr Binda 6–4, 6–3.
Men's doubles
*  Taisei Ichikawa /  Kokoro Isomura def.  Francis Alcantara /  Park Ui-sung 7–5, 2–6, [10–5].
Women's singles
*  Ekaterina Maklakova def.  Edda Mamedova 6–4, 2–6, 6–4.
Women's doubles
*  Asylzhan Arystanbekova /  Ingkar Dyussebay def.  Ekaterina Khayrutdinova /  Anna Kubareva 6–7(3–7), 6–4, [10–3].

Other entrants
The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw:
*  Zangar Nurlanuly
*  Amir Omarkhanov
*  Maxim Shin
The following players received entry from the qualifying draw:
*  Arda Azkara
*  Dominik Palán
*  Park Ui-sung
*  Mukund Sasikumar
*  Edward Winter
*  Maxim Zhukov
